ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Digest Number 211
ygData.msgSnippet: Arsenic del Sangre 65 TSK Metreus del Sangre retired 50th DE SK I am still loving this class since April of 1999. 400 days + played between my 2 SK s now.
ygData.messageBody:
Arsenic del' Sangre
65 TSK
Metreus del' Sangre
retired 50th DE SK
I am still loving this class since April of 1999.
400 days + played between my 2 SK's now.
But yah, the list is pretty dead. =)
